benchmark_index: common shares of Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL)
investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 200% of the daily performance of AAPL. The Fund does not seek to achieve its stated investment objective for any period other than a trading day.
principal_strategies: Under normal circumstances, the Fund invests at least 80% of its net assets (plus borrowings) in the common shares of Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) and financial instruments, such as swap agreements and options, that, in combination, provide daily 2X leveraged exposure to AAPL. The financial instrument most commonly used is swap agreements, and the Fund rebalances daily to maintain its targeted exposure.

benchmark_index: Common stock of Coinbase Global, Inc. Class A (NASDAQ: COIN)
tax_status: Distributions generally taxable as ordinary income
investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of -2 times (-200%) the daily percentage change of the common stock of Coinbase Global, Inc. Class A (NASDAQ: COIN).
principal_strategies: Actively managed ETF seeking to achieve inverse 2x daily returns of Coinbase Global, Inc. Class A common stock through swap agreements and option contracts, rebalanced daily.

fund_name: Defiance Daily Target 2X Long MSTR ETF
tax_status: Taxable as ordinary income, qualified dividend income, or capital gains
investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of two times (200%) the daily percentage change in the share price of MicroStrategy Incorporated.
principal_strategies: The Fund enters into swap agreements to achieve 2X daily exposure to MicroStrategy Incorporated shares, rebalancing at the end of each trading day. It may also use listed options to generate leverage. Collateral for swaps may include U.S. government securities, money market funds, short-term bond ETFs, and investment-grade corporate debt securities.

benchmark_index: Common stock of NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA)
investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 2 times (200%) the daily percentage change of the common stock of NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA).
principal_strategies: The Fund seeks to replicate 2 times the daily performance of NVIDIA Corporation common stock by entering into swap agreements, options contracts and/or directly purchasing the underlying stock, rebalancing its exposure at the end of each trading day to maintain approximately 200% notional exposure. Cash balances are invested in U.S. government securities, money market funds, short-term bond ETFs, corporate debt securities, repurchase agreements and other high-quality instruments.

fund_name: Defiance Daily Target 2X Short PLTR ETF
benchmark_index: share price of Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: PLTR)
tax_status: RIC under Subchapter M of the Internal Revenue Code
investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily inverse investment results, before fees and expenses, of -2 times (-200%) the daily percentage change in the share price of Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: PLTR). The Fund does not seek to achieve its stated investment objective for a period other than a single trading day.
principal_strategies: The Fund employs derivatives, including swap agreements and listed options contracts, to seek -2X the daily performance of Palantir Technologies Inc.’s common stock, rebalancing daily to maintain inverse leveraged exposure.

investment_objective: The Fund seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 300% of the inverse (opposite) of the daily performance of the S&P 500® Index.
principal_strategies: The Fund invests at least 80% of its net assets in financial instruments, including swap agreements, futures contracts, or short positions in securities or ETFs, that provide 3X daily inverse exposure to the S&P 500® Index and rebalances daily to maintain this exposure.

investment_objective: Seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to three times the inverse (-3x) of the daily performance of the Nasdaq-100 Index.
principal_strategies: Under normal circumstances, the Fund invests principally in derivatives (such as swap agreements and futures contracts) and money market instruments (such as U.S. Treasury bills and repurchase agreements) to obtain inverse leveraged exposure to components of the Nasdaq-100 Index or instruments with similar economic characteristics, rebalancing its portfolio each day to maintain its daily target exposure.

investment_objective: Seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to three times (3x) the daily performance of the Nasdaq-100® Index.
principal_strategies: Invests at least 80% of its assets in components of the Nasdaq-100 Index or in instruments with similar economic characteristics, including equity securities, swap agreements, futures contracts, and money market instruments, and rebalances daily to maintain its leverage exposure consistent with its daily investment objective.
